member.name: T:Nett.Parser.Matchers.BareKeyMatcher
member.summary: Note this doesn't match the all bare keys e.g. '1234'. So all keys are only recognized at the parser level.

member.name: T:Nett.Toml
member.summary: Main Nett API access.

member.name: F:Nett.Toml.FileExtension
member.summary: The TOML standard file extension '.toml'.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.Create
member.summary: Creates a empty TOML table.
member.returns: A empty table instance created with the default config.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.Create(Nett.TomlSettings)
member.summary: Creates a empty TOML table.
member.param: The config to use, to create the table.
member.returns: A new empty table created with the given config.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.Create``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a new TOML table from a given CLR object.
member.typeparam: The type of the CLR object.
member.param: The CLR object instance for that the TOML table will be created.
member.returns: A new TomlTable created with the default config, equivalent to the passed CLR object.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.Create``1(``0,Nett.TomlSettings)
member.summary: Creates a TOML table from a given CLR object.
member.typeparam: The type of the CLR object.
member.param: The CLR object instance for that the TOML table will be created.
The config to use for the creation.
member.returns: A new table representing the CLR object. The table is associated with the given config.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.ReadFile``1(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the TOML contents from some file and converts it to a CLR object.
member.typeparam: The type of the CLR object.
member.param: The absolute or relative path to the file.
member.returns: A CLR object representing the TOML contents of the file.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.ReadFile``1(System.String,Nett.TomlSettings)
member.summary: Reads the TOML contents from some file and converts it to a CLR object.
member.typeparam: The type of the CLR object.
member.param: The absolute or relative path to the file.
The settings used to process the TOML content.
member.returns: A CLR object representing the TOML contents of the file.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.ReadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the TOML contents from some file and maps it into a TomlTable structure.
member.param: The absolute or relative path to the file.
member.returns: A corresponding to the file content.
member.remarks: Uses the default TOML settings while processing the file.

member.name: M:Nett.Toml.ReadFile(System.String,Nett.TomlSettings)
member.summary: Reads the TOML contents from some file and maps it into a TomlTable structure.
member.param: The absolute or relative path to the file.
The settings used to process the TOML content.
member.returns: A corresponding to the file content.

member.name: T:Nett.ConversionBuilderExtensions
member.summary: This class provides generic specializations for IConfigureConversionBuilder.
member.remarks: These specializations are used, so that the user supplying the conversion doesn't need to invoke the TOML object constructor directly which he cannot as it is internal.

member.name: M:Nett.TomlTable.Combine(System.Func{Nett.ITargetSelector,Nett.ITableCombiner})
member.summary: Allows to combine two TOML tables to a new result table.
member.remarks: The given lambda is used to configure what combination operation should be performed.
member.param: Lambda used to configure the operation that should be performed.
member.returns: A new TomlTable instance containing the table resulting from the operation. The new table will be a completely new deep clone of the original tables/rows.

member.name: T:Nett.ITableCombiner
member.summary: Interface representing a built TOML table combine operation.
member.remarks: Use to create and consume combine operations.

member.name: T:Nett.ITargetSelector
member.summary: Builder interface to select the target table for a table combine operation.

member.name: M:Nett.ITargetSelector.Overwrite(Nett.TomlTable)
member.summary: Selects the target table of a table combine operation.
member.param: The target table. Will not get modified.
member.returns: A builder object allowing to select the source table for the combine operation.

member.name: T:Nett.ISourceSelector
member.summary: Builder interface to select the source table for a table combine operation.

member.name: M:Nett.ISourceSelector.With(Nett.TomlTable)
member.summary: Selects the source table for a table combine operation.
member.returns: A builder object allowing to select the comment operation or set the rows for the operation.

member.name: T:Nett.IRowSelector
member.summary: Builder interface to select the rows the combine operation will process.

member.name: M:Nett.IRowSelector.ForAllSourceRows
member.summary: All rows existing in source will be processed. New rows will be added to the result table. Rows already existing in the target table will be replaced.

member.name: M:Nett.IRowSelector.ForAllTargetRows
member.summary: All rows in the target table will be overwritten by the equivalent rows from the source table.

member.name: M:Nett.IRowSelector.ForRowsOnlyInSource
member.summary: Adds all existing rows from the target table and rows not existing yet in the target table to the resulting table. Effectively this is an add new rows operation.

member.name: T:Nett.ICommentOperationOrRowSelector
member.summary: Builder interface to select how comments should be handled or what rows should get processed by the combine operation.

member.name: M:Nett.ICommentOperationOrRowSelector.IncludingAllComments(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replace or append comments in the target table with comments from the source table for rows that are processed.
member.param: If true appends comments instead of replacing the target table comments.
member.returns: A builder object that allows to select the rows to process.

member.name: M:Nett.ICommentOperationOrRowSelector.IncludingNewComments
member.summary: Copies comments from the source table if the target table row does not have any comments yet.
member.returns: A builder object that allows to select the rows to process.

member.name: M:Nett.ICommentOperationOrRowSelector.ExcludingComments
member.summary: Keep comments from the target table and do not copy comments from the source table to the resulting table.
member.returns: A builder object that allows to select the rows to process.

member.name: M:Nett.ICommentOperationOrRowSelector.IncludingComments(System.Func{Nett.InputComments,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Nett.TomlComment}})
member.summary: Specify custom func to control how comments should be processed.
member.param: A func to control how comments should be handled.
member.returns: A builder object that allows to select the rows to process.

member.name: T:Nett.InputComments
member.summary: Struct representing the input data for a custom comment combiner operation.
member.remarks: Used as the input argument for a custom comment handler func for

member.name: P:Nett.InputComments.TargetComments
member.summary: Gets the comments of the target table for the row being processed. Will be an empty collection for rows that do not exist in the target table.

member.name: P:Nett.InputComments.SourceComments
member.summary: Gets the comment of the source table for the row being processed. Will be and empty collection for rows that do not exist in the source table.
